message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it for $150?
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I've already invested a lot in this product. I can do $165, but that's as low as I can go.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm still hoping to find a way to make this work within my budget. Could you possibly reconsider at $150? It would mean a lot to me.
